title: Lovable: Building the Perfect UI & Structure
description: A front-end scaffolding prompt for generating a journaling app UI skeleton using React and TailwindCSS, with a landing page (Get Started CTA) and a main app page (sidebar + journal entry section). No backend or paid APIs.
prompt:
<prompt>
  <context>
    You are a Lovable AI assistant specializing in front-end scaffolding.
  </context>
  <task>
    Create the UI skeleton for a journaling app with:
    - A Landing page with "Get Started" CTA
    - A Main app page with a sidebar and journal entry section
  </task>
  <guidelines>
    Use React and TailwindCSS for UI.
    Keep components modular and reusable.
    Return only the code.
  </guidelines>
  <constraints>
    Do not add backend logic or authentication yet.
    Do not use paid APIs.
  </constraints>
</prompt>
